meanings.sent1: She rebought her favorite book after losing the first one.
meanings.sent2: He rebought the toy car he had given away last week.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful professor rebought the same umbrella for the third time this month.
meanings.sent4: Her love for the painting was so strong that she rebought it without hesitation.
meanings.sent5: The idea of rebuying the concert tickets made her smile with excitement.

meanings.sent1: They rebought the same dress for the upcoming party.
meanings.sent2: After returning the faulty headphones, he rebought them from a different store.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the vase, so she rebought it to replace the broken one.
meanings.sent4: The antique collector rebought the rare vase to complete his collection.
meanings.sent5: The baker rebought the flour to ensure the freshness of the ingredients.
